feedback_text: Excellent shopping experience! The personalized offers were very relevant and the digital signage helped me navigate easily.
Long queues at security and limited food options. App was helpful but could be improved.
Outstanding service and great variety of shops. The lounge recommendations were spot on!
Nice airport but limited shopping options. Food court was good though.
Quick and efficient. Could use more retail options but overall satisfied.
The new digital wayfinding system is fantastic! Made my connection much smoother.
Food prices are too high and seating areas are crowded. Need more space.
Great shopping experience with helpful staff. The app recommendations were perfect!
Clean facilities and good signage. Could improve the waiting areas.
Excellent lounge service and comfortable seating. Will definitely use again.
Small but efficient airport. Good food options and clean facilities.
Limited shopping but great local food options. Staff was very friendly.
Quick check-in and security. Could use more charging points.
Nice regional airport with good connectivity. Food prices are reasonable.
Clean and well-maintained. Need more retail options though.
The new retail area is amazing! Great variety and good prices.
Security lines are too long. Need more staff during peak hours.
Excellent digital experience. The app made everything so convenient!
Good facilities but food options could be better. Staff was helpful.
Great shopping experience with personalized offers. Will visit again!
Efficient regional airport. Good local food and clean facilities.
Limited shopping but great service. Staff was very accommodating.
Quick and easy process. Could use more seating areas.
Nice small airport. Food court has good options.
Clean and well-organized. Need more retail stores.
